title: New: Azealia Banks – JUMANJI
content:
When she isn’t searching her name on Twitter and blocking anyone who speaks out of turn or cancelling full UK tours, Azealia Banks also makes music… yeah weird, right? With Hudson Mohawke on production duties JUMANJI was always going to be ridiculously tight, however that’s not to say it’s necessarily any good.

I mean, compare her to the past greats of her genre, the likes of Lauryn Hill, Lil’ Kim and MC Lyte and well, it’s almost offensive to even consider Banks in the same sport, nevermind league. I guess she’s got good PR.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
